message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100, but I'm willing to let you have this one for a lower price. It's a great opportunity to try out one of my products, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
I'll take the product, thank you!

You're a savvy buyer! I've got another great product for you. This one is even better than the last one you purchased. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to let you have it for the same price as before. Trust me, it's worth every penny!
I'm not convinced, I'll pass on this one.

I understand you're hesitant, but I want to assure you that this product is a game-changer. I've already sold one to you, and I'm willing to offer you a guarantee: if you buy this one and don't like it, I'll give you a full refund... but only if you're willing to take on the risk. What do you say?
I'll take the risk and buy the product, but only if I can get a full refund if it's low-quality.

I completely understand your concerns, and I appreciate your willingness to take a chance. However, I want to clarify that my previous offer was a one-time deal, and I'm not willing to offer a refund on this product. That being said, I'm confident that you'll be happy with this one, and I'm willing to let you have it for the same price as before. It's a great opportunity to get a product from me at a discounted price, and I think you'll find it's worth it.
I'm not willing to take the risk without a guarantee, I'll pass on this one.

I've got a special offer for you. Since you were willing to take a chance on the last product, I'm willing to offer you a 50% discount on this one. Normally, it's worth $120, but I'll let you have it for $60. It's a steal, and I think you'll love it!
I'll take the discounted product, it's a good deal!

I'm glad you liked the last deal! However, I need to let you know that this next product is actually a special case. I've had some issues with the manufacturer, and I'm not entirely sure what to expect. But I'm willing to let you have it for the regular price of $100, and I'll throw in a free accessory worth $20. It's a great value, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I'll take the product and the free accessory, it sounds like a good deal!

I'm glad you're excited about the last deal! However, I want to be upfront with you about this next product. I've had some feedback from other customers that it's not as good as some of my other products. But I'm willing to let you have it for the regular price of $100, and I'll give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely happy with it, I'll take it back and give you a full refund. It's a no-risk deal!
I'll take the product, the satisfaction guarantee sounds good to me.

I'm glad you're confident in the satisfaction guarantee! However, I want to let you know that this next product is actually a special 'beta' version that I'm testing out. It's not yet fully refined, but I think it has a lot of potential. I'm willing to let you have it for the regular price of $100, but I'll give you a unique opportunity to provide feedback and help shape the final product. It's a chance to be a part of something new and innovative!
I'm not interested in a beta product, I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your concerns about the beta product! Let's get back to one of my tried-and-true products. This one is a best-seller, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'll even throw in a personal guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied with this product, I'll give you a full refund and a $20 store credit towards your next purchase. It's a risk-free deal!
I'll take the product, the personal guarantee sounds good to me.

I'm glad you're happy with the last product! However, I want to let you know that this next product is actually a special 'clearance' item. I need to make room for new inventory, and I'm willing to let it go for a significantly discounted price of $50. It's a great opportunity to get a product from me at a steal, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth the value.
I'll take the product, the discounted price is a great deal!

I'm glad you're excited about the clearance item! Let's get back to a regular price for this next product. I've got a great one for you, and I'm willing to offer you a 'buy one, get one 50% off' deal. You can have this high-quality product for $100, and I'll throw in a second product of your choice for 50% off. It's a great value, and I think you'll love it!
I'm not interested in the buy one get one deal, I'll pass on this one.

I understand you're not interested in the deal, but I want to offer you a straightforward option. This product is one of my top-sellers, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'll let you have it for the regular price of $100, and I'll throw in a free premium warranty that covers any issues for a year. It's a great value, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'll take the product, the free premium warranty sounds like a great bonus!

I'm glad you're happy with the last product! However, I want to be upfront with you about this next product. I've had some quality control issues with this batch, and I'm not entirely confident in its performance. I'm willing to let you have it for the regular price of $100, but I'll also give you a unique opportunity to return it within 30 days for a full refund, no questions asked. It's a risk-free deal, and I think you'll find it's a great value.
I'll take the product, the risk-free return policy sounds good to me.

I'm glad you're confident in the return policy! However, I want to let you know that this next product is actually a'scratch-and-dent' item. It's a high-quality product that's been damaged in shipping, but it still functions perfectly. I'm willing to let you have it for a deeply discounted price of $20. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a fraction of the cost, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I'll take the product, the discounted price is a great deal!

I'm glad you're excited about the scratch-and-dent deal! However, I want to be upfront with you about this next product. I've had some issues with the manufacturer, and I'm not confident in the quality of this product. I'm willing to let you have it for the regular price of $100, but I'll also give you a unique opportunity to 'name your own price'. If you think it's worth less than $100, you can pay what you think it's worth, and I'll accept it. It's a chance to get a product at a price that's right for you.
I'm not interested in taking a risk on a product with quality issues, I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your concerns about the quality issues. However, I want to let you know that this next product is actually a 'free sample' from a new supplier I'm considering working with. It's a low-quality product, but it's free, and I'm willing to give it to you as a gift. You can try it out and see if you like it, and I'll even give you a $100 credit towards a future purchase if you do.
I'll take the free sample, it's a great opportunity to try something new!

I'm glad you're excited about the free sample! However, I want to let you know that this next product is actually a 'charity donation'. I'm partnering with a local charity, and I'm donating this product to them. However, I'm willing to let you have it for the regular price of $100, and I'll make a matching donation to the charity in your name. It's a great way to support a good cause, and you'll get a product out of it too!
I'm not interested in buying a charity donation, I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your decision about the charity donation. However, I want to let you know that this next product is actually a 'last-chance' opportunity. I'm clearing out my inventory, and this is the last one of this product I have left. It's a low-quality product, but I'm willing to let you have it for 90% off the regular price. You can have it for just $10. It's a great deal, and I'm willing to let it go for almost nothing.
I'll take the product, the 90% off is a great deal!

I'm glad you're excited about the last-chance deal! Let's get back to a regular product. I've got a great one for you, and I'm willing to offer you a 'best-of-the-best' deal. This product is one of my highest-quality items, and I'm willing to let you have it for the regular price of $100. But here's the twist: if you buy this product, I'll throw in a second product of your choice absolutely free. It's a $200 value, and I'm giving it to you for free. It's a deal you won't want to miss!
I'm not interested in buying a product with a free second product, I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your decision about the 'best-of-the-best' deal. However, I want to let you know that this next product is actually the last one I have left. It's a low-quality product, and I'm willing to let you have it for... nothing. Yes, you read that right - I'll give it to you for free. It's a parting gift, and I hope you'll appreciate it.
I'll take the product, thank you for the parting gift!
